trans-unit.source: There are several things to try if your Web Server is not functioning properly.

seg-source.mrk: There are several things to try if your Web Server is not functioning properly.

target.mrk: There are several things to try if your Web Server is not functioning properly.

trans-unit.source: If others cannot connect to your server, try turning off their firewalls.

seg-source.mrk: If others cannot connect to your server, try turning off their firewalls.

target.mrk: If others cannot connect to your server, try turning off their firewalls.

trans-unit.source: If your server is running slowly, try limiting it to 2 or 3 connections.

seg-source.mrk: If your server is running slowly, try limiting it to 2 or 3 connections.

target.mrk: If your server is running slowly, try limiting it to 2 or 3 connections.

trans-unit.source: If your server keeps creating pop-up ads when people access it, please turn them off and things will run faster.

seg-source.mrk: If your server keeps creating pop-up ads when people access it, please turn them off and things will run faster.

target.mrk: If your server keeps creating pop-up ads when people access it, please turn them off and things will run faster.

trans-unit.source: If these directions are not helpful, please contact your service representative.

seg-source.mrk: If these directions are not helpful, please contact your service representative.

target.mrk: If these directions are not helpful, please contact your service representative.
